meanings.definition: The act of evaluating or assessing something.
meanings.sent1: The teacher's testing of the students' knowledge was thorough.
meanings.sent2: I always get nervous before a big testing day at school.
meanings.sent3: The cat decided to do some testing of the new scratching post.
meanings.sent4: Her testing of the waters before making a decision paid off.
meanings.sent5: The scientist's testing of the hypothesis led to an exciting discovery.

meanings.definition: The process of conducting experiments or trials to determine the quality or performance of something.
meanings.sent1: The company's testing of the new product was extensive.
meanings.sent2: The testing of the vaccine showed promising results.
meanings.sent3: The chef's testing of different ingredients resulted in a delicious dish.
meanings.sent4: The athlete's testing of new training methods improved their performance.
meanings.sent5: The car manufacturer's testing of safety features ensured customer satisfaction.
